name: EVOS the GDC BUILD
description:
EVOS is a 2D Deep Space Atmospheric Horror Side-Scroller, inspired by aspects of Point-and-Click games. 

The player awakens aboard the GIGAS, a massive colony ship taking colonists to populate a new planet. However when people go missing, a private investigation group is called to the ship to uncover the mystery. 48 hours later, the player awakens in a storage room with no memory of who they are, why they are there, and what happened to everyone on the ship. It is up to you to uncover the truth to these mysteries, save anyone alive, and get out of there as soon as possible.

In this build, we focus on showcasing our game's atmospheric emphasis and reveal some upcoming mechanics: Terminal Hacking, Locker Hiding, and Vents! Solve the puzzles in the Terminals to proceed to the end.

Our projected Release date for our Vertical Slice is the End of April - Early May, 2023.
Explore the abandoned MALL.SOUTH and it's desolate sectors. Uncover what happened during the time the Player was asleep, and piece together what happened in the ship.

// CONTROLS:

////Outside Controls

WASD: Movement
Left Mouse Button: Interact
>> Interactable Objects are: Lockers, Vents, Doors, and Terminals.

////Hacking Controls

Path Maze: Use the Mouse to guide a Virus through the maze, but do not touch the firewalls!
Frogger: [WASD] : Move the Virus through the gaps
